title: Refinery Crude Slate Optimization
description: A refinery economist uses an LP model to decide the optimal blend of crude oils to purchase for next month to maximize gasoline production.

tasks.description: Gather current market prices for available crude oils (e.g., WTI, Brent, Mars).
tasks.expected_outcome: A list of crudes and their current spot prices is compiled.

tasks.description: Input the crude prices and their assay data into the refinery's Linear Programming (LP) model.
tasks.expected_outcome: The LP model is correctly populated with the latest data.

tasks.description: Run the LP model to determine the most profitable crude slate and generate a purchase recommendation.
tasks.expected_outcome: The model outputs a recommended blend of crudes that maximizes the refinery's gross margin.
